response.original_title: 心霊vs人間 古今東西 怨霊の乱編
response.overview: This is the fifth horror documentary featuring OPQ's "Dapom," who enjoys absolute popularity among young people on the Internet video distribution service, and psychic idols Ryua, Shizuku Hoshino, and ZeNrA, who take on terrifying haunted places. The four psychic mavericks use ancient and modern séance techniques to summon spirits.
response.title: Psychic vs. Human: Past and Present - Revolt of Grudges Edition

titles.title: Psychic vs Human: Kokon Tōzai - Onryō no Ran-hen
